Reviews.Title: Awesome...
Reviews.Author: Diana Dykstra
Reviews.Content: So excited.  Great product, in great condition.  Seller was very helpful, always checking to make sure we were good with everything.  I couldn't have gotten a better deal! I was so nervous buying used, but I would do it again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: horrible phone
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Well I went to US Cellular to try and activate it and it wouldn't activate or even charge. I returned it and I still haven't gotten my money back and according to the tracking number it was delivered....not happy at all!!!
